Mixing things up

Vuyo turned 6 this year and had a great birthday helping my sister make him a mocktail

He also finished pre-school, I still can't say that with a straight face.

The Wedding

My older sister got married (not the one I live with)

first time I have seen most of these people in years saw my granny for the first time in years, and so did her great grandson

In his excited rambling he asked "Granny why do you look like a witch?"

I was completely thrown off, but she calmly answered that she was getting old. Big ups to the woman that raised my Dad.

Shout out to the Springboks for winning

Vuyo's first world cup and he was screaming along with the rest of the fans. I think he was just keeping up with the energy

Loving this year with my son, family and friends. The growth was great. Look how far we've come from 2016.

Especially if you wear glass. This will be the first time you see 2020.
